name: Indian Foot Salon
description:
Welcome to Indian Foot Salon
Looking for good Pedicure salon ?

If so welcome to Indian Foot Salon game where you have option to decor your own nails with different nail polish and stickers with all the glossy effects.

You also have option to stick objects for more decorative nails.

we will soon be launching henna and nail salon version of same game and would like your feedbacks on the same so we can improve things in our next version.

please download for free and leave us your feedback.

Its important for us to improve.
